properties.name: srp.cors.allowed-origins
properties.description: Comma-separated list of URLs that may make CORS requests (no wildcards)

properties.name: srp.cors.allowed-methods
properties.description: Comma-separated list of HTTP methods allowed in CORS requests (default: DELETE,GET,HEAD,POST,PUT)

properties.name: srp.cors.allowed-headers
properties.description: Comma-separated list of Headers allowed in CORS requests (defaults to *)

properties.name: srp.cors.allow-credentials
properties.description: Control whether CORS requests may include credentials
